title: To Do list
description: In this project, PHP and MySQL are used to create a  effective To-Do List application. This project's goal is to give users the ability to plan, organize, and create their daily chores. For long-term data management, the application will store tasks in a MySQL database. Tasks can be added, updated, deleted, and marked as finished by users.

title: Merit Adminstration
description: In this project, WordPress, management system (CMS), hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS) Lightsail, is used to create and launch a dynamic website. With its adaptable design, easy-to-use navigation, and effective content management tools, the website will function as an educational and entertaining platform.
